title: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed
description: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed. It already tried, and it can't.8.
OB: When the plugin becomes unavailable, the workbench still retains references to the invalid views.
EB: The last time Eclipse was closed, the plugin was not available. Therefore, the workbench should no longer have any references to this plugin.7.
SR: Update the workbench's reference tracking mechanism to remove references to views when the plugin becomes unavailable.
